text: Jeremy Meeks Divorce from Melissa's a Done Deal Jeremy and Melissa Meeks'Divorce a Done Deal Exclusive Details 12 : 14 PM PT - - According to the divorce docs - - obtained by TMZ - - the couple will share joint legal custody... she gets primary physical custody. Melissa will have their son 70 % of the time, and Jeremy will have him 30 %. Both have waived spousal support. Melissa will keep the house and they both get to keep their vehicles. As we previously reported, Jeremy's been ordered to pay $ 1, 000 per month in child support. He also owes $ 12, 000 to Melissa's attorney, Lisa Bloom. The hits keep coming for Jeremy Meeks... 9 days after his son with Chloe Green
